name: Pakken
description:
PLEASE PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!

Pakken is an inspired by Mondrian's art style game in which, using your grappling hook, you have to avoid the bosses e shoot them.

The game was developed for SecretGameJam, hosted by gamedevleague.com on July 2016.

Controls:

keyboard: mouse movement to aim, left mouse button to hook, right mouse button to shoot , W and D or arrow keys to move move horizontally, P to pause

controller: right stick to aim, RB to shoot, LB to hook, left stick to move horizontally, start to pause
